message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
Thanks for the offer Alice, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $85 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to spend less, but I'm still willing to make a compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $95.
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice, but $95 is still a bit out of my price range.  How about we split the difference and I'll take it for $90?
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go any lower than $92. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $90 and $95. How about we try $92?
